alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Crow Wing; Northern Aitkin; Northern Cook, Northern Lake; South Aitkin; South Cass (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 15 at 6:54AM CST until December 16 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. For the Wind Advisory, west winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Northern Cook and Lake, Central St. Louis, South Cass, Crow Wing, Northern Aitkin, South Aitkin and Carlton and South St. Louis Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Bois Forte Band, Lake Vermilion area, the Fond du Lac Band and the Mille Lacs Band, East Lake and, Big Sandy Lake areas. * WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, until noon CST today. For the Wind Advisory, from 9 PM this evening to 9 AM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Crow Wing; Northern Aitkin; Northern Cook, Northern Lake; South Aitkin; South Cass
